summary:
I have extensive experience working as a counselor who specializes in helping adolescents and families with substance abuse and behavioral health issues. Additionally, I am the founder and director of a Recovery High School and a Community Center that serves the Latino community. My background has equipped me with the skills necessary for a school leadership position that focuses on children with behavioral issues.

Through my years of counseling, I have gained a deep understanding of the complexities surrounding behavioral health issues. This experience allows me to empathize with and support students who are facing similar challenges. My dedication to community health and youth well-being, especially in the area of substance use disorders, underscores my commitment to positively impacting young lives.

Leading the establishment and management of a Recovery High School has honed my ability to develop and implement innovative educational programs that meet the specific needs of adolescents struggling with behavioral issues. Furthermore, my involvement in overseeing a Community Center that caters to the Latino community demonstrates my cultural competence, which is essential for fostering diversity and understanding within a school environment.

I aspire to become a college professor and author, which reflects my passion for education and knowledge dissemination. These qualities are crucial for inspiring and guiding both students and staff within a school setting. Additionally, I enjoy playing the guitar, exercising, and traveling, which highlight a balanced lifestyle that can serve as a positive example for students.

Overall, my diverse experience, unwavering commitment to youth well-being, leadership abilities, and enthusiasm for education make me a compelling candidate for a school leadership role focused on addressing behavioral issues among students. I believe my multifaceted background equips me with the necessary skills and insight to effectively lead and support a school community. My experience as a counselor and the founder of a Recovery High School and Community Center makes me a compelling candidate for a school leadership role. I'm committed to positively impacting young lives and fostering diversity.
 #education #youthwellbeing #leadership #diversity #behavioralhealth

message.text:
🎓 **Exciting News from #FloridaRecoverySchools! 🎓

We're thrilled to announce the launch of our innovative programs designed to support and celebrate our students' journey to success:

🌟 Senior Graduation Program: whether test scores, missing  required course or some other reason.  You do not need to wait until next year to graduate. We have a program that will allow you to propell your way past those obstacles to the finish line  and then together we will celebrate with you your milestone achievement! Our next graduation ceremony is set for August 9th,  will you be there?

🏡 Homeschooling Flexibility: Education tailored to your needs! Whether you choose to include counseling services or prefer curriculum-only, our homeschool program adapts to what works best for you and your family.

🏫 Nationally Recognized Full-Service In-School Program: Experience excellence in education and support. Our comprehensive program has been acknowledged nationwide for its outstanding contribution to student development and recovery.

Join us in celebrating these incredible opportunities for growth and learning. Together, we're building brighter futures one student at a time.

📢 Spread the word and let's make a difference together!

#RecoveryEducation #StudentSuccess #BrightFutures

---

📣 **Take Action for a Brighter Future!**

Ready to transform your life or help someone close to you? Don't miss out on the chance to be part of our empowering programs. Reach out to us to learn more, enroll in our programs, or support our mission to uplift teens in their recovery journey.

👉 Contact us today at 904-864-6463 or visit our website https://lnkd.in/ejTGVXCe to get started. Let's make a lasting impact together!

#JoinTheJourney #TransformLives #RecoverySchool

🎓 Ready to achieve your crucial graduation milestone? 🎓

As a high school senior, you might need extra help completing your graduation requirements. That’s where the Florida Recovery Schools Graduation Assistance Program comes in! With our comprehensive support, affordable pricing, and all-inclusive package, we’re here to help you reach this important milestone!

Why choose our program?
Our program has assisted numerous students who would only have been able to complete their high school requirements with our program upon graduating high school this year.

Affordable: For just $275, our program includes:
Enrollment
Four self-paced, fully online courses to help you prepare for independence and adulthood
cap and gown
An official diploma
graduation ceremony
The transcript is retained on file for future reference

How to enroll:
1. Log in to https://lnkd.in/ejTGVXCe
2. Go to the forms page
3. Fill out the form
4. Set an appointment to come in to complete your registration in your four courses

Registration opens on May 28th

Our Next Graduation Date: August 9th, 2024

Payment Information:
Enrollment Fee: $275, payable via personal check or Venmo.
Checks: Please make checks payable to “New Hope Education and Addiction Service, Inc.”
Venmo: Pay via Venmo here: @FRS-FCRA

Don’t miss the opportunity to celebrate your achievements. Enroll in our Graduation Assistance Program today and take the final step toward your future success.

📞 **Contact Us:**
Florida Recovery Schools  
Phone: 904-864-6463  
Email: danrenaud@floridarecoveryschools.org  
Website: [https://lnkd.in/e5Db8Evq)

Florida Recovery Schools: Empowering Students, One Graduate at a Time!

Graduation Triumph at #FloridaRecoverySchools 🎉

We are thrilled to announce that 44 remarkable young individuals have turned their tassels at the Florida Recovery Schools' graduation ceremony held at our serene River Oaks Center, nestled in the embracing grounds of Unity Church.

This momentous occasion was witnessed by an astounding gathering of 400 supportive adults, each one a testament to the unwavering belief in our graduates' potential and resilience.

🌟 Highlights of the Day:
- Inspirational speeches that echoed hope and determination.
- Joyful cheers and heartfelt congratulations filling the air.
- A community united in celebrating the success of its youth.

We invite you to relive these unforgettable moments:
- Check out our #Facebook page for a gallery of smiles and achievements.
- Visit our #YouTube page for a replay of the day's joy and pride.

Together, we've created a milestone that marks not just an end, but an exciting beginning of new journeys. Let's continue to support and empower our youth for brighter futures!

#GraduationDay #RecoverySuccess #NewBeginnings
The effects of Alcohol and Opiates on the BBPOC Misuse community

ingestedContentSummary.fullText: Join the Journey: Boost the Family Recovery Center Transform Lives and Strengthen Your Community At the Family Recovery Center, we provide a sanctuary of hope and healing for coming together and for community. Our mission is to promote resilience and health within our community by addressing these challenges head-on. We believe that together, we can transform lives and create a brighter future. That's why we invite you to join us as a club member booster and become an integral part of this inspiring journey towards recovery. By contributing $1,000 annually, you not only support the vital services of the Family Recovery Center but also gain access to an array of exclusive benefits designed to enrich your life and connect you with a community of like-minded individuals. Your membership plays a crucial role in enabling us to offer comprehensive support services at no charge, paving pathways to recovery for those in need. - **Luxury Prizes**: Participate in monthly drawings for a chance to win luxury prizes, adding an element of excitement to your membership. - **Discounted Facility Use**: Enjoy discounted access to our state-of-the-art facilities, where healing and community come together. - **Quarterly Gatherings and Networking Events**: Engage with fellow members, community leaders, and professionals at our quarterly gatherings, fostering connections that go beyond the center. - **End-of-the-Year Dinners**: Celebrate the year's achievements and milestones with an exclusive dinner, recognizing the collective efforts of our members and staff. - **Win a Cruise for Two**: The highlight of our membership incentives, enter the draw for a chance to win a cruise for two, a perfect getaway that rewards your generous support. Your membership directly contributes to the success and sustainability of the Family Recovery Center. With your support, we can continue to offer a wide range of services including mental health counseling, intensive outpatient drug treatment, and educational programs, all aimed at preventing recidivism and enhancing public safety. Together, we can make a measurable and positive change in the lives of those affected by substance use disorders, preparing them for success and a healthier future. Become a club member booster and be part of a community that values recovery, resilience, and health. Your contribution not only provides you with exclusive benefits but also makes a significant impact on the lives of individuals and families in need. Join us on this journey to strengthen our community and transform lives. Together, we can make a difference. Join the Journey: Boost the Family Recovery Center" is more than a campaign; it's a commitment to healing, hope, and health. We look forward to welcoming you to our community of supporters.
ingestedContentSummary.title: The 500 Friends of New Hope: Supporting the Family Recovery Center

message.text:
¿Está buscando una manera de marcar la diferencia en la vida de los estudiantes de Florida Recovery School y sus familias? No busque más allá de la comunidad de 500 Amigos de Nueva Esperanza. Al unirte a esta increíble comunidad, no solo estarás apoyando programas y servicios vitales, sino que también disfrutarás de beneficios exclusivos como sorteos de premios mensuales, eventos sociales trimestrales y una cena inolvidable de fin de año y un sorteo de cruceros. Por solo $88 al mes o $1,000 al año, puede tener un impacto significativo en la vida de quienes más lo necesitan. No esperes más, regístrate hoy y forma parte de una comunidad que realmente marca la diferencia. Únase a nosotros para apoyar a #500FriendsofNewHope y #SupportingRecovery.
https://lnkd.in/gw3sUusw

message.text:
Attention professionals in the Florida community - join "The 500 Friends of New Hope" and make a meaningful difference. This supportive network provides resources for students in recovery and their families while offering exclusive benefits like prize drawings, networking events, and an end-of-year cruise. Your $88 monthly or $1,000 annual membership dues directly fund critical programs. Join us in empowering those on the path to recovery. #500FriendsofNewHope #CommunityImpact
